bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Etiological Agent. of heat poison that stagnates inside the human body and generates accumulations that are difficult to expel. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry sang zhai hui 桑柴灰 quotes [Zhu] Zhenheng 震亨：火以暢達 , 拔引鬱毒，此從治之法也 , “To allow the fire to expand freely, one extracts the pent-up [heat] poison . This is the therapy pattern of compliance [with the nature of the pathogenic agent]”.
